works.description: Space comes at premium these days, and that’s the very reason people prefer modular furniture units that take in less space but serve in more than one way. Enter the Albed Line, an intelligent modular system in which the shelves become structural. Presented at the Salone del Mobile 2011 in Milan, the modular shelving system has painted aluminum profiles and lacquered compartments in stacked layers, and you can adjust the dividers and containers to suit your liking.
